item.title: New Team Leader Todo List
item.description: To be a leader for a team is not as easy as working with machines, because people have their own ideas, attitudes, preferences, and styles of working, etc. I have experienced forming a team and taking over existing teams many times in my working experience, here are some important things I think worth noting for new team leaders. Know your team member It’s definitely worthy to spend time and energy to establish how you want the team to work, but how to express your idea and be accepted by your members should be considered as the first thing for a new team leader todo list.
